title: Hellsing Ultimate OVA (1-4) English Dubbed DvDrip-soagg
description:
Hellsing Ultimate OVA Episode 01 - 04 English Dubbed DvDrip

Outline:

OVA 1 - Policewoman Seras Victoria's world is turned upside down when she is turned into a dracurina by Alucard. She accompanies Alucard on missions to destroy ghouls and the vampires controlling them. Along the way she encounters Father Anderson of the Vatican. Can she survive this deadly confrontation and avoid suffering the same fate as a decapitated Alucard?

OVA 2 - While Seras becomes accustomed to being a vampire at Hellsing headquarters, two other vampires known as the Valentine brothers break into the Hellsing headquarters with an army of ghouls.

OVA 3 - The introduction of the Wild Geese mercenaries takes place as well as Integra's meeting with the Vatican's Enrico Maxwell. A mission to Rio de Janeiro is followed by a massacre at Hotel Rio, leading to the duel between Alucard and Alhambra. Will Alucard yet again have to "Summon his familiars"?

OVA 4 - Millenium takes the first step towards war as the insane major plans to destroy Britain. Meanwhile a vampire with a magic bullet known as Rip Van Winkle takes over a ship along with its crew and makes her way towards England. How will Alucard stop her?
